com.lmax.disruptor
Class Sequence

java.lang.Object
  com.lmax.disruptor.Sequence
Direct Known Subclasses:
SequenceGroup
public class Sequence
extends java.lang.Object

Cache line padded sequence counter. Can be used across threads without worrying about false sharing if a located adjacent to another counter in memory.

Constructor Summary
Sequence()
          Default Constructor that uses an initial value of Sequencer.INITIAL_CURSOR_VALUE.
Sequence(long initialValue)
          Construct a sequence counter that can be tracked across threads.
